page.title: 16Population of Hawkchurch
page.content: There are 200 households in Hawkchurch. In the summertime the number of people increases because of people coming on holiday. A lot of cottages are empty in the winter and then the population drops. We found out that in 1754 there were 80 men in the village and these were their occupations: Thatcher 1 Taylor 1 Blacksmith 4 Carpenter 2 Cordwainer 9 Sherman 4 Husbandman 22 Potter 1 Butcher 3 Twinespinner 7 Mariner 1 Clothier 2 Farmer 3 Mason 1 Labourer 7 Ropemaker 1 Reverend 1 Flaxdresser 2 Yeoman 1 Miller 1 Populations 1801:679 1835:897 1851:773 1875:666 1905:463
